hero.title: Dubai Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Built for hub-transfer velocity, fare-system variation, and climate-aware field execution.

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Define customs-to-transport sequence and fallback pickup logic before landing.
actions: Store legal ride options and support contacts.
Apply first-day schedule with heat-safe buffers.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Use metro and targeted taxi connectors to reduce transfer uncertainty.
actions: Group activities by corridor instead of district name alone.
Avoid back-and-forth moves across the city in one block.
Preserve one indoor fallback venue per day segment.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Prioritize digital-first payment reliability with one physical backup lane.
actions: Enable roaming and wallet rails before departure.
Store QR and booking confirmations offline.
Keep one low-volatility cash reserve for edge cases.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: If delays occur, collapse itinerary into high-certainty blocks with short connectors.
actions: Advance airport return window for outbound flights.
